content: I think I'll check out Hot Take and The Media Roundup to see what they have to say about climate change and media coverage. It's interesting to think about how the way we consume media can impact our understanding of climate change and our behavior. By the way, I've been meaning to cancel my subscription to Vanity Fair, as I've found myself not having the time to read it regularly. Do you think there are any ways to make reading physical magazines more sustainable, or should I just switch to digital versions?
